name: QrPngForegroundPatternOptions
summary: Foreground pattern options for styling dark modules.

properties.name: Type
properties.summary: Gets or sets the pattern type.

properties.name: Color
properties.summary: Gets or sets the pattern color (alpha recommended).

properties.name: BlendMode
properties.summary: Gets or sets the pattern blend mode.

properties.name: SizePx
properties.summary: Gets or sets the pattern cell size in pixels.

properties.name: ThicknessPx
properties.summary: Gets or sets the pattern thickness (dot radius or stripe thickness).

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Random seed used by jittered pattern variants such as CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngForegroundPatternType.SpeckleDots.

properties.name: Variation
properties.summary: Variation amount (0..1) used by jittered pattern variants.

properties.name: Density
properties.summary: Dot density (0..1) used by jittered pattern variants.

properties.name: SnapToModuleSize
properties.summary: When true, pattern cell size snaps to a multiple of the QR module size.

properties.name: ModuleStep
properties.summary: Module size multiplier when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngForegroundPatternOptions.SnapToModuleSize is enabled.

properties.name: ApplyToModules
properties.summary: When true, applies the pattern to non-eye modules.

properties.name: ApplyToEyes
properties.summary: When true, applies the pattern to eye (finder) modules.
